name: PRS:Parallel Reality Shot
description:
Programming: Kruzenger

Modeling: 15rubles

Movement:

Use W, A, S, D for movement

Shooting:
Use Left Mouse Button for Shooting, and R to reload your weapon

Shops:
Use E to open Shop or Upgrade Station

When Your Artifact  is charged use Q to destroy all the enemies.

When you see Purple Enemies use F to move to another reality and defeat enemies there.

Good Luck!
